mapper.select: SELECT b.bid, b.uid, u.nick_name, b.tid, t.type, b.book_title, b.book_content, b.view_number, b.like_number, b.is_public, b.create_time, b.modify_time FROM notebook.book_note b, notebook.user u, notebook.type t WHERE b.bid = #{bid} AND b.uid = u.uid AND b.tid = t.tid

SELECT b.bid, b.uid, u.nick_name, b.tid, t.type, b.book_title, b.view_number, b.like_number, b.is_public, b.create_time, b.modify_time FROM notebook.book_note b, notebook.user u, notebook.type t WHERE b.uid = #{uid} AND b.uid = u.uid AND b.tid = t.tid ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT b.bid, b.uid, u.nick_name, b.tid, t.type, b.book_title, b.view_number, b.like_number, b.is_public, b.create_time, b.modify_time FROM notebook.book_note b, notebook.user u, notebook.type t WHERE b.tid = #{tid} AND b.uid = u.uid AND b.tid = t.tid ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT b.bid, b.uid, u.nick_name, b.tid, t.type, b.book_title, b.view_number, b.like_number, b.is_public, b.create_time, b.modify_time FROM notebook.book_note b, notebook.user u, notebook.type t WHERE b.book_title LIKE '%${reg}%' OR b.book_content LIKE '%${reg}%' AND b.uid = #{uid} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
